description.english: Increase an attribute score to 25.
description.french: Atteindre 25 dans un score de caractéristique.
description.italian: Aumenta il punteggio di una caratteristica a 25.

description.english: Have an Armor Class of -15 or lower.
description.french: Atteindre -15 en Classe d'Armure.
description.italian: Ottieni una Classe Armatura pari o inferiore a -15.

description.english: Have a Lore skill of 100 or more.
description.french: Atteindre 100 en score de connaissances.
description.italian: Raggiungi un punteggio di Conoscenza pari o superiore a 100.
description.russian: Повысить Знание легенд до 100 или выше.
description.polish: Uzyskaj współczynnik Wiedza na poziomie 100 lub więcej.

description.english: Become a Grand Master.
description.french: Atteindre la Grande Maîtrise.
description.italian: Diventa un Gran Maestro.

description.english: Complete the game solo.
description.french: Finir le jeu sans recruter de compagnon.
description.italian: Completa il gioco da solo.

description.english: Complete the game on Legacy of Bhaal difficulty.
description.french: Finir le jeu en mode Succession de Bhaal.
description.italian: Completa il gioco alla difficoltà Retaggio di Bhaal.
description.russian: Завершить игру на уровне сложности Наследие Баала.
description.polish: Ukończ grę na poziomie trudności Dziedzictwo Bhaala.

description.english: Complete the game on Story Mode difficulty.
description.french: Finir le jeu en mode Histoire.
description.italian: Completa il gioco alla difficoltà Modalità Storia.

displayName.french: On ne Laisse Personne en Arrière !

description.english: Finish the game without any party members dying.
description.french: Finir le jeu sans qu'aucun compagnon ne meure durant la confrontation finale.
description.italian: Completa la partita senza che nessun membro del gruppo sia morto.
description.russian: Закончить игру со всеми живыми компаньонами.
description.polish: Ukończ grę, nie tracąc żadnego członka drużyny.

displayName.french: On ne Fait Pas d'Omelette Divine...

description.english: Finish the game with a full party of dead allies.
description.french: Finir le jeu avec vos cinq compagnons décédés durant la confrontation finale.
description.italian: Completa la partita con un gruppo di alleati morti.
description.russian: Закончить игру со всеми мёртвыми компаньонами.
description.polish: Ukończ grę, tracąc wszystkich członków drużyny.

description.english: Reach 150 Hit Points.
description.french: Atteindre 150 Points de Vie.
description.italian: Raggiungi 150 Punti Ferita.

description.english: Acquire Heroic reputation.
description.french: Atteindre une réputation héroïque.
description.italian: Ottieni la reputazione Eroico.

description.english: Acquire Despised reputation.
description.french: Atteindre une réputation méprisée.
description.italian: Ottieni la reputazione Disprezzato.

description.english: Kill 1,000 creatures.
description.french: Tuer 1000 créatures.
description.italian: Uccidi 1000 creature.

description.english: Become a Fallen Paladin or a Fallen Ranger.
description.french: Devenir un Paladin ou Rôdeur déchu.
description.italian: Diventa un Paladino Decaduto o un Ranger Decaduto.
description.russian: Стать падшим паладином или падшим следопытом.

displayName.french: Le Plus Beau Jour de ma Vie !

description.english: Have Bless, Chant, and Luck active at the same time.
description.french: Être affecté en même temps par les effets de Bénédiction, Cantique et Chance.
description.italian: Litania, Benedizione e Fortuna attivi contemporaneamente.
description.russian: Получить одновременное воздействие Благословения, Песни и Удачи.
description.polish: Aktywuj jednocześnie zaklęcia Błogosławieństwo, Psalm i Szczęście.

description.english: Have Disease, Fatigue, and Poison active at the same time.
description.french: Subir en même temps la Maladie, le Poison et l'Épuisement.
description.italian: Veleno, Fatica e Malattia attivi contemporaneamente.
description.russian: Получить одновременное воздействие болезни, яда и усталости.
description.polish: Bądź pod jednoczesnym wpływem efektów choroby, zmęczenia i trucizny.

description.english: Escaped from the wizard's dungeon.
description.french: S'échapper du donjon du magicien.
description.italian: La tua fuga dalle segrete del mago ha avuto successo.

description.english: Raised enough gold to hire assistance.
description.french: Récolter suffisamment d'or pour engager de l'aide.
description.italian: Hai raccolto abbastanza denaro per garantirti un adeguato sostegno.
description.russian: Собрать достаточно золота для платы за помощь.
description.polish: Zbierz ilość pieniędzy wystarczającą do wynajęcia pomocy.

description.english: Set sail for Spellhold.
description.french: Mettre les voiles en direction de Spellhold.
description.italian: Hai allestito una nave per Spellhold.

displayName.french: Vol Au-Dessus d'un Nid de Coucous

description.english: Rescued an old friend from Spellhold.
description.french: Secourir une vieille amie à Spellhold.
description.italian: Hai soccorso una vecchia amica a Spellhold.

description.english: Survived the perils of the Underdark.
description.french: Survivre aux dangers de l'Ombre-Terre
description.italian: Hai superato i pericoli del Sottosuolo.

description.english: Defeated the vampire queen Bodhi.
description.french: Vaincre la reine vampire Bodhi.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto la regina dei vampiri, Bodhi.

description.english: Struck down Jon Irenicus and reclaimed your soul.
description.french: Vaincre Jon Irenicus et récupérer votre âme.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto Jon Irenicus e reclamato la tua anima.
description.russian: Сразить Джона Айреникуса и вернуть свою душу.
description.polish: Pokonaj Jona Irenicusa i odzyskaj swą duszę.

description.english: Allied yourself with the Shadow Thieves.
description.french: S'allier aux Voleurs de l'Ombre.
description.italian: Hai stretto un'alleanza con i Ladri dell'Ombra.
description.russian: Вступить в союз с Теневыми Ворами.

description.english: Allied yourself with Athkatla's vampire guild.
description.french: S'allier à la guilde des vampires d'Athkatla.
description.italian: Hai stretto un'alleanza con la gilda dei vampiri di Athkatla.
description.russian: Вступить в союз с вампирской гильдией Аткатлы.
description.polish: Zawiąż sojusz z gildią wampirów w Athkatli.

description.english: Risked the mysterious portal in Spellhold.
description.french: Se risquer à travers le portail mystérieux de Spellhold.
description.italian: Hai corso il rischio di attraversare il misterioso portale a Spellhold.
description.russian: Отважиться на путешествие через таинственный портал в Спеллхолде.
description.polish: Zaryzykuj podróż tajemniczym portalem prowadzącym do Czarowięzów.

description.english: Took another chance with Saemon Havarian.
description.french: Tenter sa chance avec Saemon Havarian.
description.italian: Hai concesso un'altra possibilità a Saemon Havarian.
description.russian: Снова попытать удачи с Саймоном Хаварианом.
description.polish: Zaryzykuj ponowną podróż z Saemonem Havarianem.

description.english: Found your way to the pocket plane in Hell.
description.french: Découvrir l'Antichambre.
description.italian: Trova la strada per il piano extradimensionale negli Inferi.
description.russian: Найти путь в карманный план в Аду.
description.polish: Znajdź drogę prowadzącą do sfery kieszeniowej w Piekle.

description.english: Defeated the fire giant Bhaalspawn Yaga-Shura.
description.french: Vaincre le géant de feu fils de Bhaal Yaga-Shura.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto il gigante del fuoco Yaga Shura, progenie di Bhaal.
description.russian: Победить потомка Баала, огненного великана  Яга-Шуру.

description.english: Slew the blue dragon Bhaalspawn Abazigal.
description.french: Vaincre le dragon bleu fils de Bhaal Abazigal.
description.italian: Hai ucciso il drago blu Abazigal, progenie di Bhaal.
description.russian: Убить потомка Баала, синего дракона Абазигала.

description.english: Overpowered the drow Bhaalspawn Sendai.
description.french: Vaincre la drow fille de Bhaal Sendai.
description.italian: Hai sopraffatto la drow Sendai, progenie di Bhaal.

description.english: Defeated the monk Bhaalspawn Balthazar.
description.french: Vaincre le moine fils de Bhaal Balthazar.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto il monaco Balthazar, progenie di Bhaal.
description.russian: Одержать победу на потомком Баала, монахом Балтазаром.

description.english: Destroyed Amellyssan the Blackhearted and took your place as a god.
description.french: Vaincre Amélyssanne Cœur-Noir et devenir une divinité.
description.italian: Hai distrutto Amelyssan dal Cuore Nero e preso il suo posto come divinità.
description.russian: Уничтожить Амелиссан Чёрносердую и обрести божественный статус.
description.polish: Zabij Amelissanę o Czarnym Sercu i zajmij należne ci miejsce jako bóg.

description.english: Destroyed Amellyssan the Blackhearted and refused the power of Bhaal.
description.french: Vaincre Amélyssanne Cœur-Noir et refuser le pouvoir de Bhaal.
description.italian: Hai distrutto Amelyssan dal Cuore Nero e hai rifiutato il potere di Bhaal.
description.russian: Уничтожить Амелиссан Чёрносердую и отказаться от власти Баала.
description.polish: Zabij Amelissanę o Czarnym Sercu i odmów przyjęcia mocy Bhaala.

description.english: Faced the first challenge in the pocket plane in Hell.
description.french: Faire face à la première épreuve de l'Antichambre.
description.italian: Affronta la prima prova nel piano extradimensionale negli Inferi.
description.russian: Смело встретить первое испытание в карманном плане.
description.polish: Pokonaj pierwsze wyzwanie sfery kieszeniowej w Piekle.

description.english: Encountered your alternate self.
description.french: Rencontrer une version différente de soi-même.
description.italian: Incontra il tuo alter ego.

description.english: Confronted your own innocence and defeated the Slayer.
description.french: Se confronter à sa propre innocence et vaincre.
description.italian: Confrontati con la tua innocenza e sconfiggi l'Uccisore.
description.russian: Противостоять своей невинности и победить Убийцу.
description.polish: Skonfrontuj się ze swą niewinnością i pokonaj Zabójcę.

description.english: Discussed your fate with Cyric and faced his champions.
description.french: Parler du destin avec Cyric et vaincre ses champions.
description.italian: Discuti del tuo destino con Cyric e affronta il suo campione.
description.russian: Обсудить своё предназначение с Цириком и сразиться с его любимцами.
description.polish: Przedyskutuj swój los z Cyriciem i zmierz się z jego czempionami.

description.english: Struck down the Ravager.
description.french: Vaincre le Ravageur.
description.italian: Abbatti il Distruttore.

description.english: Disarm the traps in the lower level of the wizard's dungeon.
description.french: Désarmer les pièges au niveau inférieur du donjon du magicien.
description.italian: Disarma tutte le trappole nel livello inferiore delle segrete del mago.
description.russian: Обезвредить ловушки на нижнем уровне подземелья волшебника.
description.polish: Rozbrój pułapki na niższym poziomie lochu czarodzieja.

description.english: Solve the "skinner" murders.
description.french: Résoudre les meurtres du district du Pont.
description.italian: Risolvi i delitti dello "scuoiatore".
description.polish: Rozwiąż zagadkę morderstw w Dzielnicy Mostów.

description.english: Return Wellyn's missing bear.
description.french: Rendre à Wellyn son ours en peluche.
description.italian: Riporta a Wellyn il suo orsacchiotto.

description.english: Put Hendak in charge of the Copper Coronet.
description.french: Mettre Hendak à la tête de la Couronne de Cuivre.
description.italian: Fa' in modo che Hendak diventi proprietario del Diadema di Rame.

description.english: Discover the secrets of the planar sphere.
description.french: Découvrir les secrets de la sphère planaire.
description.italian: Scopri il segreto della Sfera Planare.

description.english: Destroy the cult of the Unseeing Eye.
description.french: Détruire le culte de l'Œil Aveugle.
description.italian: Distruggi il culto dell'Occhio Offuscato.

description.english: Break the trade monopoly in Trademeet.
description.french: Mettre un terme au blocus commercial à Franc-Marché.
description.italian: Rompi il monopolio del commercio a Trademeet.
description.polish: Przełam panujący w Targowie monopol handlowy.

description.english: Put a stop to the strange animal attacks at Trademeet.
description.french: Mettre un terme aux attaques des animaux à Franc-Marché.
description.italian: Metti fine agli strani attacchi degli animali a Trademeet.
description.russian: Положить конец странным нападениям животных на Трейдмит.
description.polish: Połóż kres niecodziennym atakom zwierząt w Targowie.

description.english: Find the source of evil in the temple ruins outside the Umar Hills.
description.french: Découvrir la source du mal dans les ruines du temple près des collines d'Umar.
description.italian: Trova la fonte del male nelle rovine del tempio sulle Colline di Umar.
description.russian: Найти источник зла в развалинах храма рядом с Холмами Умар.
description.polish: Odszukaj źródło zła w ruinach świątyni nieopodal Wzgórz Umar.

description.english: Find and return Garren Windspear's missing child.
description.french: Porter secours à l'enfant disparu de Garren Lancevent.
description.italian: Trova e riporta a Garren Windspear la sua prole.
description.russian: Найти и спасти похищенное дитя Гаррена Виндспира.

description.english: Free the mage Vithal in the Underdark.
description.french: Libérer le mage Vithal en Ombre-Terre.
description.italian: Libera Vithal il mago nel Sottosuolo.

description.english: Defeat Kangaxx the demilich.
description.french: Vaincre la demi-liche Kangaxx.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Kangaxx il semilich.

description.english: Found and defeated the Twisted Rune.
description.french: Découvrir et vaincre la Rune Tordue.
description.italian: Trova e Sconfiggi la Runa Contorta.

description.english: Double-crossed Matron Mother Ardulace in Ust Natha.
description.french: Duper la Mère Matrone Ardulace à Ust Natha.
description.italian: Tradisci la Madre Matrona Ardulace a Ust Natha.
description.russian: Обмануть матрону-мать Ардулейс в Уст Нате.
description.polish: Przechytrz Matkę Przełożoną Ardulace z Ust Natha.

description.english: Double-crossed Phaere in Ust Natha.
description.french: Duper Phaere à Ust Natha.
description.italian: Tradisci Phaere a Ust Natha.

description.english: Found a hidden mind flayer lair.
description.french: Découvrir l'antre secrète des flagelleurs mentaux.
description.italian: Scopri un covo nascosto di mind flayer.

description.english: Cast Limited Wish and dealt with the results.
description.french: Lancer le sort de Souhait Mineur... et en subir les conséquences.
description.italian: Lancia l'incanstesimo Desiderio Minore e affrontane le conseguenze.
description.russian: Произнести заклинание «Ограниченное желание» и разобраться с результатами.
description.polish: Rzuć zaklęcie Ograniczonego życzenia i zmierz się z konsekwencjami.

description.english: See Anomen join the Most Noble Order of the Radiant Heart.
description.french: Aider Anomen à rejoindre l'Ordre du Cœur Radieux.
description.italian: Fa' in modo che Anomen si unisca al Nobilissimo Ordine del Cuore Radioso.
description.russian: Помочь Аномену вступить в Благороднейший орден Лучезарного сердца.
description.polish: Bądź świadkiem wstąpienia Anomena w szeregi Najszlachetniejszego Zakonu Promiennego Serca.

description.english: Reunite Cernd with his estranged family.
description.french: Réunir Cernd avec sa famille perdue.
description.italian: Fa' in modo che Cernd si riunisca alla sua famiglia.
description.russian: Способствовать воссоединению Сернда со своей бывшей семьёй.
description.polish: Pomóż Cerndowi pogodzić się ze swoją rodziną.

description.english: Help Edwin track down the Nether Scroll.
description.french: Aider Edwin à retrouver le Parchemin Néthère.
description.italian: Aiuta Edwin a ritrovare la Pergamena di Nether.
description.russian: Помочь Эдвину в поисках нетерильского свитка.

description.english: Rescue Haer'Dalis from a grim fate.
description.french: Porter secours à Haer'Dalis.
description.italian: Salva Haer'Dalis da un triste destino.

description.english: Find a way to break Jaheira's curse.
description.french: Briser la malédiction de Jaheira.
description.italian: Trova un modo per spezzare la maledizione che grava su Jaheira.
description.polish: Znajdź sposób na przełamanie klątwy rzuconej na Jaheirę.

description.english: Help Jan's loved ones.
description.french: Aider les amis de Jan.
description.italian: Aiuta le persone amate da Jan.

description.english: Help Keldorn settle matters with his family.
description.french: Aider Keldorn avec ses problèmes familiaux.
description.italian: Aiuta Keldorn a sistemare la situazione con la sua famiglia.

description.english: Track down the Book of Kaza for Korgan.
description.french: Retrouver le Livre de Kaza pour Korgan.
description.italian: Ritrova il Libro di Kaza per Korgan.

description.english: Help Mazzy Fentan's sister.
description.french: Aider la sœur de Mazzy Fentan.
description.italian: Aiuta la sorella di Mazzy Fentan.

description.english: Help Nalia prove the corruption within the Roenall family.
description.french: Aider Nalia à prouver la corruption au sein de la famille Roenall.
description.italian: Aiuta Nalia a provare la corruzione della famiglia Roenall.
description.russian: Помочь Налии изобличить коррупцию в семье Роеналов.
description.polish: Pomóż Nalii udowodnić korupcję w rodzinie Roenallów.

description.english: Discovered a traitor in your midst.
description.french: Découvrir un traître dans vos rangs.
description.italian: Scopri un traditore tra le fila del tuo gruppo.

description.english: Put Yoshimo's soul to rest.
description.french: Apaiser l'âme de Yoshimo.
description.italian: Permetti allo spirito di Yoshimo di riposare in pace.
description.polish: Wyślij duszę Yoshimo na wieczny spoczynek.

description.english: Acquire the warrior stronghold.
description.french: Acquérir le bastion du guerrier.
description.italian: Ottieni l'avamposto del Guerriero.

description.english: Acquire the wizard stronghold.
description.french: Acquérir le bastion du magicien.
description.italian: Ottieni l'avamposto del Mago.

description.english: Acquire the thief stronghold.
description.french: Acquérir le bastion du voleur.
description.italian: Ottieni l'avamposto del Ladro.

description.english: Acquire the cleric stronghold.
description.french: Acquérir le bastion du clerc.
description.italian: Ottieni l'avamposto del Chierico.

description.english: Acquire the paladin stronghold.
description.french: Acquérir le bastion du paladin.
description.italian: Ottieni l'avamposto del Paladino.

displayName.french: La Cabane au Fond de la Forêt

description.english: Acquire the ranger stronghold.
description.french: Acquérir le bastion du rôdeur.
description.italian: Ottieni l'avamposto del Ranger.

description.english: Acquire the druid stronghold.
description.french: Acquérir le bastion du druide.
description.italian: Ottieni l'avamposto del Druido.

description.english: Acquire the bard stronghold.
description.french: Acquérir le bastion du barde.
description.italian: Ottieni l'avamposto del Bardo.

description.english: Recruited Sarevok.
description.french: Recruter Sarevok.
description.italian: Recluta Sarevok.

description.english: Convinced Imoen to restore Sarevok with her soul.
description.french: Persuader Imoen de restaurer Sarevok avec sa propre âme.
description.italian: Convinci Imoen a ristorare Sarevok sacrificando la sua anima.
description.russian: Убедить Имоен пожертвовать Саревоку частичку души.
description.polish: Przekonaj Imoen, aby przywróciła duszę Sarevokowi.

description.english: Acquire the Celestial Fury blade.
description.french: Acquérir la Furie Céleste.
description.italian: Ottieni la lama Furia Celestiale.

description.english: Recover Carsomyr, the Holy Avenger.
description.french: Retrouver Carsomyr.
description.italian: Recupera Carsomyr, il Sacro Vendicatore.

description.english: Construct Crom Faeyr.
description.french: Forger Crom Faeyr.
description.italian: Forgia Crom Faeyr.

description.english: Acquire the Robe of Vecna.
description.french: Acquérir la Robe de Vecna.
description.italian: Ottieni la Tunica di Vecna.

displayName.french: Nouveau Look pour une Nouvelle Vie

description.english: Don the sword, shield, helm, and plate of Balduran.
description.french: Revêtir l'armure, le heaume, le bouclier et l'épée de Baldurien.
description.italian: Equipaggia la spada, lo scudo, l'elmo e l'armatura di Balduran.
description.russian: Надеть меч, щит, шлем и броню Балдурана.
description.polish: Przywdziej cały ekwipunek Baldurana, na który składają się miecz, tarcza, hełm i zbroja płytowa.

description.english: Took the form of the Slayer.
description.french: Prendre la forme de l'Écorcheur.
description.italian: Trasformati nell'Uccisore.

description.english: Slew the red dragon Firkraag.
description.french: Tuer le dragon rouge Firkraag.
description.italian: Sconfiggi il drago rosso Firkraag.
description.polish: Zgładź czerwonego smoka o imieniu Firkraag.

description.english: Slew the shadow dragon Thaxll'ssillyia.
description.french: Tuer le dragon d'ombre Thaxll'ssillyia.
description.italian: Sconfiggi il drago d'ombra Thaxll'ssillyia.
description.polish: Zgładź cienistego smoka o imieniu Thaxll'ssillyia.

description.english: Slew the black dragon Nizidramanii'yt.
description.french: Tuer le dragon noir Nizidramanii'yt.
description.italian: Sconfiggi il drago nero Nizidramanii'yt.
description.polish: Zgładź czarnego smoka o imieniu Nizidramanii'yt.

description.english: Slew the silver dragon Adalon.
description.french: Tuer le dragon d'argent Adalon.
description.italian: Sconfiggi il drago d'argento Adalon.
description.polish: Zgładź srebrną smoczycę o imieniu Adalon.

description.english: Used the scroll of reversal to free the green dragon Fil'Yissetat.
description.french: Utiliser un parchemin pour libérer le dragon vert Fil'yissetat.
description.italian: Usa la pergamena di inversione per liberare il drago verde Fil'Yissetat.
description.russian: Использовать свиток обращения для освобождения зелёного дракона Флл'Йиссетат.
description.polish: Użyj zwoju odwrócenia do uwolnienia zielonej smoczycy o imieniu Fil'Yissetat.

description.english: Reach level 30 with a Mage or Sorcerer.
description.french: Atteindre le niveau 30 avec un Mage ou un Ensorceleur.
description.italian: Raggiungi il 30° livello con un Mago o uno Stregone.
description.russian: Достичь 30-го уровня как маг или колдун.
description.polish: Osiągnij 30. poziom w klasie maga lub czarownika.

description.english: Reach level 30 with a Thief or Bard.
description.french: Atteindre le niveau 30 avec un Voleur ou un Barde.
description.italian: Raggiungi il 30° livello con un Ladro o un Bardo.
description.russian: Достичь 30-го уровня как вор или бард.
description.polish: Osiągnij 30. poziom w klasie złodzieja lub barda.

description.english: Reach level 30 with a Fighter, Ranger, Paladin, Monk, or Barbarian.
description.french: Atteindre le niveau 30 avec un Guerrier, un Rôdeur, un Paladin, un Moine ou un Barbare.
description.italian: Raggiungi il 30° livello con un Guerriero, Ranger, Paladino, Monaco o Barbaro.
description.russian: Достичь 30-го уровня как боец, следопыт, паладин, монах или варвар.
description.polish: Osiągnij 30. poziom w klasie wojownika, łowcy, paladyna, mnicha lub barbarzyńcy.

description.english: Reach level 30 with a Cleric, Druid, or Shaman.
description.french: Atteindre le niveau 30 avec un Clerc, un Druide ou un Chaman.
description.italian: Raggiungi il 30° livello con un Chierico, Druido o Sciamano.
description.russian: Достичь 30-го уровня как священник, друид или шаман.
description.polish: Osiągnij 30. poziom w klasie kapłana, druida lub szamana.
